overview: From acclaimed director Axel Braun comes the hilariously sexy spoof of one of the most popular shows on TV. Carrie Mathison, a bipolar CIA officer, is told by an informant that an American prisoner of war has been turned. Convinced that 'turned' means 'gay', she sets her sights on US Marine sergeant Nicholas Brody and becomes obsessed with uncovering the truth behind the alleged war hero. Featuring a stellar cast, a hysterical script, and standout acting performances by Foxx and Calhoun, "This Ain't Homeland XXX" is the hottest, funniest porn parody of the year!
title: This Ain't Homeland XXX
